double ldmx::ParameterSet::getDouble ( const std::string &  name) const

Get a double by name or throw an exception if not available, or not the right type.

Parameters:
nameName of the double parameter.

Definition at line 36 of file ParameterSet.cxx.

References EXCEPTION_RAISE.

Referenced by ldmx::DummyProducer::configure(), ldmx::TriggerProcessor::configure(), ldmx::PnWeightProcessor::configure(), ldmx::HcalVetoProcessor::configure(), ldmx::HcalDigiProducer::configure(), ldmx::EcalVetoProcessor::configure(), and ldmx::EcalDigiProducer::configure().

                                                              {
        std::map<std::string, Element>::const_iterator ptr = elements_.find(name);
        if (ptr == elements_.end()) {
            EXCEPTION_RAISE("ParameterNotFound", "Double parameter '" + name + "' not found");
        }
        if (ptr->second.et_ != et_Double) {
            EXCEPTION_RAISE("ParameterTypeError", "Parameter '" + name + "' is not a double");
        }
        return ptr->second.doubleval_;
    }
